name: Curse of Uddh
description:
As it is said, everybody is the fool of someone else, but this time, you need to save him to reach your goal.
He says he is the brain but you know that without your strength and strategy, you won’t make it to the treasure.

Controls Keyboard
  • Movements : ZQSD/WASD/Arrows
  • Attacks : 1, 2, 3 (alt : Space/A/E or Space/Q/E)
Gamepad
  • Movements : Left stick
  • Attacks : X, A, B
Team Art
  • François Mauge
  • Vincent Schneider
Design
  • Nyckos
  • Marie Lorent
Programming
  • David Taralla
  • Loïc Siquet
  • Quentin Chevalier
